div.div: Pacific Lutheran, WA vs. UW-Eau Claire
at Eau Claire, WI | Carson Park

tr.td: PLU wins toss defers, Lutes will kick and defend East end zone
Kaylor kickoff 49 yards to the UWEC16, Thurgood Dennis return 12 yards to the UWEC28 (Kaufman).
Joel Sweeney rush for loss of 1 yard to the UWEC27 (Patterson).
Mark Munger pass complete to Alex Plaster for loss of 3 yards to the UWEC24.
Mark Munger pass incomplete to Nick Hirsch.
Scott Burzynski punt 31 yards to the PLU45, downed.
